logoutSuccessDescription: Your password has been changed. Please login again using your new password.
logoutFailedDescription: Password was changed successfully, but there was an error logging you out. Please refresh the page.

profile-info-card.title: Profile information
profile-info-card.description: Update your accounts profile information and email address. If you are going to change your e-mail you will have to verify it.

password-card.title: Change Password
password-card.description: Change your password. After successful password change you will be logged out on all devices.

two-factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
two-factor.description: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve token from your phone's Google Authentication application.
two-factor.finish-instructions: To finish enabling two factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code.
two-factor.recovery-instructions: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.

confirm-password-modal.title: Confirm Password
confirm-password-modal.description: Before you can modify two factor authentication, we need your password.
